hyperparameters.name: n_estimators
hyperparameters.short_desc: The number of trees in the forest.

hyperparameters.name: learning_rate
hyperparameters.short_desc: Learning rate shrinks the contribution of each tree by learning_rate.

hyperparameters.name: max_depth
hyperparameters.short_desc: The maximum depth of the tree.

hyperparameters.name: colsample_bytree
hyperparameters.short_desc: The subsample ratio of columns when constructing each tree.

hyperparameters.name: min_child_weight
hyperparameters.short_desc: Minimum sum of instance weight (hessian) needed in a child.

hyperparameters.name: subsample
hyperparameters.short_desc: Subsample ratio of the training instance.

hyperparameters.name: gamma
hyperparameters.short_desc: Minimum loss reduction required to make a further partition on a leaf node of the tree.
